Katas See all the suggested coding katas. Roman Numerals Learn TDD/ensembling in a highly constrained environment Fantasy Battle Learn A Tenant of OOP - The Law of Demeter Gilded Rose Refactoring Kata This refactoring kata can help you to learn about refactoring messy code. DeliveryController Refactoring Kata This refactoring kata can help you to learn about mocks and stubs. Parrot Refactoring Kata to learn about Polymorphism. Necklace Refactoring Kata Learn more about OOP - Chain of Responsibility Pattern.
